headline: Looking At The Mastercard (MA) Narrative After New Research And Digital Payments Developments
summary: Why the Mastercard Story Just Got a Subtle Upgrade Mastercard's fair value estimate has inched higher, from about US$657.37 to about US$661.39 per share, reflecting research updates that tie recent results to ongoing strength in digital payments and value added services. These refreshed views lean on solid spending trends and Mastercard's role in cross border and digital payment flows, which analysts see as important for the revenue mix over time. If you want to stay on top of how this...

headline: Does Trump’s 10% Credit Card Rate Cap Make Visa and Mastercard a Buy?
summary: President Donald Trump announced on his social media platform Truth Social that he will impose a one-year cap on credit card interest rates at 10%, effective Jan. 20, the one-year anniversary of his second inauguration. He cited affordability concerns and criticized rates of 20% to 30% under the prior administration. This move represents yet another ...
